alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 4:06AM EST until February 25 at 6:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total combined snow and sleet accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern Fairfield, Northern New Haven, Northern Middlesex and Northern New London Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute, and possibly the evening commute as well.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London
